title: What is React?
content: Introduction to React library, its benefits, and why it's popular for building user interfaces. Learn about components and the virtual DOM.

title: Creating Your First Component
content: Step-by-step guide to creating functional and class components in React. Learn about JSX syntax and component structure.

title: State and Props
content: Understanding the difference between state and props. Learn how to manage component state and pass data between components.
